CustomField.defaultValue: " *General Account Information, Competitive Information, Contacts and Opportunities are already fields for entry in SFDC, utilize these existing areas and functions in SFDC rather than duplicating information, these will be auto populated when printing the plan* "
CustomField.description: This field is created (ref:- CR 1404) as a workaround to having a Help text on top of Account PLan page . The label font color has been set to match the background of the record screen.
CustomField.label: <font color="#fff">Message
